leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-变异检测与基因分型生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: CLI + 评测套件 + 数据集

queries: [WEB] variant effect prediction deep learning github

tools.name: ASC3
tools.one_line_profile: Variant prioritization tool for rare Mendelian diseases using multiple instance learning
tools.detailed_description: A variant prioritization tool that leverages multiple instance learning (MIL) to identify causal variants in rare Mendelian disease genomic testing.

tools.name: MIRACUM-Pipe
tools.one_line_profile: Whole exome sequencing pipeline with variant annotation and reporting
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) pipeline that includes advanced variant annotation features and automated PDF reporting capabilities.

tools.name: PIntron
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for gene-structure prediction via spliced alignment
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for gene-structure prediction based on spliced alignment of transcript sequences (ESTs and mRNAs) against a genomic sequence.

tools.name: stmp
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence to Medical Phenotypes pipeline for variant annotation and prioritization
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline featuring variant annotation, prioritization, pharmacogenomics, and tools for analyzing genomic trios (mother, father, child).

tools.name: simple_sv_annotation
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to simplify snpEff annotations for structural variants
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to simplify and streamline snpEff annotations for interesting structural variant cases.

tools.name: AlphScore
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogenicity prediction of missense variants using AlphaFold features
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improving pathogenicity prediction of missense variants by incorporating features derived from AlphaFold protein structures.

tools.name: AlphaMissenseCheck
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to check variant pathogenicity using AlphaMissense predictions
tools.detailed_description: A utility to analyze personal genomic data (e.g., 23andMe) against AlphaMissense pathogenicity predictions.

tools.name: Watershed
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic model for rare variant prioritization using RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the prioritization of functional rare genetic variants by integrating genomic annotations and RNA-seq data.

tools.name: VariantAnnotation
tools.one_line_profile: Bioconductor package for annotation of genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: A Bioconductor package for reading, writing, and annotating genetic variants in VCF format.

tools.name: ensemblVEP
tools.one_line_profile: R Interface to Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor
tools.detailed_description: A Bioconductor package providing an R interface to the Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP) for querying variant effects.

tools.name: geneXtendeR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for functional annotation of ChIP-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R/Bioconductor package designed for optimized functional annotation of ChIP-seq data, focusing on gene extensions.

tools.name: SURFY2
tools.one_line_profile: Classifier for predicting human transmembrane protein surface location
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning classifier to predict whether a human transmembrane protein is located at the cell surface or in intracellular membranes.

tools.name: FANTASIA
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation tool based on embedding space similarity
tools.detailed_description: A tool for Functional ANnoTAtion based on embedding space SImilArity, leveraging representation learning.

tools.name: introme
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to prioritise splice-altering variants for clinical interpretation
tools.detailed_description: Introme prioritises coding and noncoding splice-altering variants for clinical variant interpretation.

tools.name: vep_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for variant annotation using VEP
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to automate variant annotation processes using the Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP).

tools.name: genmod
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to annotate genetic inheritance patterns in VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A tool to annotate models of genetic inheritance patterns in variant files (VCF), aiding in the identification of disease-causing variants.

tools.name: stranger
tools.one_line_profile: Annotates repeat expansion variants with pathologic implications
tools.detailed_description: A tool to annotate output files from ExpansionHunter and TRGT with the pathologic implications of the repeat expansions.

tools.name: GenomicInteractions
tools.one_line_profile: R package for handling and annotating genomic interaction data
tools.detailed_description: An R/Bioconductor package for handling genomic interaction data, annotating genomic features with interaction information, and producing summary statistics.

tools.name: snpEff (DBHi-BiC fork)
tools.one_line_profile: Variant annotation tool (Fork with HGVS support)
tools.detailed_description: A version of snpEff that includes HGVS annotations for nucleotide changes, predicting the functional effects of genomic variants.

tools.name: vcf_annotation_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for VCF filtering and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow to filter, annotate, and prepare variant call format (VCF) data using GATK4, SnpSift, VEP, and genmod.

tools.name: svpop
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for variant annotation and merging
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for variant annotation and merging, developed by the Eichler Lab.

tools.name: VEP_plugins
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of plugins for Ensembl VEP
tools.detailed_description: Official repository for plugins that extend the functionality of the Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP).

tools.name: Ensembl VEP
tools.one_line_profile: Standard tool for predicting functional effects of genomic variants
tools.detailed_description: The Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP) predicts the functional effects of genomic variants on genes, transcripts, and protein sequence, as well as regulatory regions.

tools.name: Envision
tools.one_line_profile: Predictor of protein variant molecular effect
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning predictor of protein variant molecular effect, trained using large-scale experimental mutagenesis data.

tools.name: ExPecto
tools.one_line_profile: Ab initio prediction of expression effects of genomic variants
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for predicting expression effects of human genome variants ab initio from sequence.

tools.name: genieBPC
tools.one_line_profile: R package for creating analytic cohorts from GENIE BPC data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for creating analytic cohorts from AACR Project GENIE BPC clinically annotated genomic data.

tools.name: GenomeView
tools.one_line_profile: Stand-alone genome browser and editor
tools.detailed_description: A stand-alone genome browser and editor that provides interactive visualization of sequences, annotations, alignments, and syntenic mappings.

tools.name: ClassifyCNV
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for clinical annotation of copy-number variants
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for the clinical annotation and classification of copy-number variants (CNVs) according to ACMG guidelines.

tools.name: USeq
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of Java applications for NGS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite of over 180 Java applications for analyzing next-generation sequencing data, including ChIP-seq, RNA-seq, and variant annotation.

tools.name: table_annovar-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for variant annotation using ANNOVAR
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed to automate the annotation of genetic variants using ANNOVAR, facilitating reproducible and scalable bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: SpliceAI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for splice variant prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool that accurately predicts splice junctions from pre-mRNA sequence, aiding in the identification of non-coding variants that affect splicing.

tools.name: UTRannotator
tools.one_line_profile: VEP plugin for 5' UTR variant annotation
tools.detailed_description: A VEP (Variant Effect Predictor) plugin designed to annotate high-impact variants in the 5' untranslated regions (UTR), specifically looking for uORF-creating variants.

tools.name: Seave
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for filtering and annotating genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform that enables the filtering and annotation of genetic variants with in silico pathogenicity scores and disease database information, supporting exome and genome data.

tools.name: gnomAD_DB
tools.one_line_profile: SQLite database converter for gnomAD VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A package that scales large gnomAD VCF files into a SQLite database to facilitate fast querying of minor allele frequencies (MAF) for variant analysis.

tools.name: OpenCRAVAT
tools.one_line_profile: Modular variant annotation and prioritization tool
tools.detailed_description: A dynamic, modular tool for the annotation and prioritization of genomic variants, supporting a wide range of annotators and visualization options.

tools.name: SOSTAR
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for RNA isoform annotation and diversity mapping
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for fine-mapping RNA isoform diversity using targeted long-read RNA sequencing, facilitating isoform annotation.

tools.name: SPiP
tools.one_line_profile: Splicing Prediction Pipeline for variant effect analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to predict the splicing effects of genetic variants, aiding in the interpretation of potential splice-altering mutations.

tools.name: Parsing-SnpEff
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for SnpEff annotation results
tools.detailed_description: A utility to parse SnpEff output into tabular formats, facilitating downstream analysis of annotated SNPs.

tools.name: DBFE
tools.one_line_profile: Distribution-Based Feature Extraction for genomic variants
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for extracting features from distributions of genomic variants to facilitate machine learning classifier development.

tools.name: PyMissense
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogenicity plotting tool for AlphaMissense data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create pathogenicity plots and modified PDB structures for custom proteins based on AlphaMissense predictions.

tools.name: FASSO
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Annotations using Sequence and Structure Orthology
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating functional annotations for maize genetics using sequence and structural orthology information.

tools.name: NeoPredPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Neoantigen prediction pipeline from VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for predicting neoantigens from single or multi-region VCF files, utilizing ANNOVAR for annotation and netMHCpan for binding prediction.

tools.name: SpliceR
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of BE-splice sgRNAs for base editing
tools.detailed_description: A program designed to predict base editor-mediated splice sgRNAs for knockout experiments.

tools.name: EVE
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary model for variant effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that uses evolutionary data to predict the clinical significance of genetic variants, enabling large-scale interpretation.

tools.name: GenNotes
tools.one_line_profile: Public consensus annotation system for genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: A platform and toolset for the public consensus annotation of genetic variants, facilitating community-driven variant interpretation.

tools.name: CLEAN-Contact
tools.one_line_profile: Enzyme functional annotation with structural inference
tools.detailed_description: A contrastive learning-enabled model for predicting enzyme functional annotations by incorporating structural inference.

tools.name: PlasticityRegularisations_G3
tools.one_line_profile: Regularised VEP Stokes routines for geophysics
tools.detailed_description: Julia routines for Visco-Elasto-Plastic (VEP) Stokes solvers with regularization, used in geophysical fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Stokes2D_simpleVEP
tools.one_line_profile: 2D Stokes solver with VEP rheology
tools.detailed_description: A simple implementation of Visco-Elasto-Plastic (VEP) rheology for 2D Stokes solvers, applicable in geodynamic modeling.

tools.name: StructuralVariantAnnotation
tools.one_line_profile: R package for structural variant analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides infrastructure for analyzing and annotating structural variants, integrating with the Bioconductor ecosystem.

tools.name: get_MNV
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identifying and reclassifying MNVs
tools.detailed_description: A tool that identifies multiple SNVs within the same codon from genomic reads, reclassifies them as Multi-Nucleotide Variants (MNVs), and computes amino acid changes.

tools.name: PharmCAT
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacogenomic Clinical Annotation Tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to extract pharmacogenomic variants from VCF files and generate clinical reports based on CPIC guidelines.

tools.name: ProteinGym-Base
tools.one_line_profile: Infrastructure for variant effect prediction datasets
tools.detailed_description: Provides the data infrastructure and classes to combine assays, sequences, MSAs, and structures for variant effect prediction research.

tools.name: ProteinGym-Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for variant effect prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of variant effect prediction models and pipelines to benchmark them against the ProteinGym datasets.

tools.name: RiboSplitter
tools.one_line_profile: RNA alternative splicing and translation prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein translation consequences of RNA alternative splicing events.

tools.name: spyrmsd
tools.one_line_profile: Symmetry-corrected RMSD calculation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for calculating symmetry-corrected Root Mean Square Deviation (RMSD), essential for comparing molecular structures.

tools.name: CAVA
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical Annotation of Variants
tools.detailed_description: A fast and lightweight tool for the clinical annotation of genomic variants, designed to be compatible with standard VCF formats.

tools.name: NCBoost
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogenicity classifier for non-coding variants
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning classifier specifically designed to predict the pathogenicity of non-coding variants in Mendelian diseases.

tools.name: HRIBO
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for bacterial Ribo-seq annotation
tools.detailed_description: A high-throughput workflow for the analysis and annotation of bacterial Ribo-seq data, including ORF prediction and quality control.

tools.name: VirMake
tools.one_line_profile: Viral metagenomic analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline for viral metagenomic data analysis, offering taxonomic and functional annotation.

tools.name: fastDFE
tools.one_line_profile: Inference of the distribution of fitness effects (DFE) from VCF data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the fast and flexible inference of the distribution of fitness effects (DFE) of mutations. It includes functionality for parsing VCF files to Site Frequency Spectra (SFS) with ancestral allele and site-degeneracy annotation.

tools.name: PROST
tools.one_line_profile: Protein stability change predictor for missense mutations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the effects of missense mutations on protein stability changes using protein sequence data. It leverages AlphaFold2 for predicting PDB structures from FASTA sequences to inform the stability analysis.

tools.name: HgvsGo
tools.one_line_profile: HGVS notation analyzer for SNVs and indels
tools.detailed_description: A program designed for analyzing 'c.' and 'p.' HGVS (Human Genome Variation Society) notations for single nucleotide variations (SNVs) and small insertions/deletions (indels) after variant calling. It serves as an alternative to tools like snpEff and VEP.

tools.name: LipidLynxX
tools.one_line_profile: Lipidome annotation converter and linker
tools.detailed_description: A tool that provides the possibility to convert, cross-match, and link various lipid annotations to tools supporting lipid ontology, pathway, and network analysis, aiming for systems-wide integration of lipidome dynamics.

tools.name: covigator-ngs-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 NGS variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for NGS variant calling on SARS-CoV-2 data. It processes FASTQ files to produce normalized and annotated VCF files using tools like GATK, BCFtools, LoFreq, and iVar.

tools.name: vafator
tools.one_line_profile: Technical annotation of VCF variants from BAM files
tools.detailed_description: A tool to annotate variants in a VCF file with technical annotations (such as allele frequencies and read depths) derived directly from one or more BAM alignment files.

tools.name: Diablo_ACMG
tools.one_line_profile: Automated ACMG classification for genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated classification of genetic variants according to the criteria established by the American College of Medical Genetics and Genomics (ACMG).

tools.name: coMET
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for EWAS and genomic association scans
tools.detailed_description: An R-based package and web-based plotting tool to visualize genome-wide association scans, particularly Epigenome-Wide Association Scans (EWAS). It visualizes association signals, methylation correlation (co-methylation), and functional genomic annotations.

tools.name: GenePy
tools.one_line_profile: Gene scoring tool using VEP annotation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for gene scoring and prioritization that utilizes Ensembl VEP annotations and gnomAD data. It is designed to handle variant effect prediction and scoring for genetic analysis.

tools.name: VPOT
tools.one_line_profile: Variant Prioritisation Ordering Tool for ANNOVAR VCFs
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to allow prioritization of variants in VCF files that have been annotated with ANNOVAR. It helps in ordering variants based on specific criteria for downstream analysis.

tools.name: InterVar
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical interpretation of genetic variants by ACMG-AMP guidelines
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics software tool for the clinical interpretation of genetic variants according to the 2015 ACMG-AMP guidelines. It automates the classification of variants based on various evidence criteria.

tools.name: PhenoSV
tools.one_line_profile: Phenotype-aware prioritization of structural variants
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable phenotype-aware model for the prioritization of genes affected by structural variants (SVs). It integrates phenotype information to improve the identification of pathogenic SVs.

tools.name: ICAnet
tools.one_line_profile: ICA-based functional module detection for cell clustering
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses Independent Component Analysis (ICA) to decipher functional modules for better cell clustering and annotation, likely in the context of single-cell data analysis.

tools.name: VVP
tools.one_line_profile: VAAST Variant Prioritizer
tools.detailed_description: VVP (VAAST Variant Prioritizer) is a tool for rapidly prioritizing genetic variants. It is designed to work with VAAST output or similar data to identify likely pathogenic variants.

tools.name: Maverick
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning variant effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Mendelian approach to variant effect prediction built in Keras. It uses deep learning to predict the pathogenicity or effect of genetic variants.

tools.name: hpcleap_dnds
tools.one_line_profile: Sliding window dN/dS vs functional domain comparison
tools.detailed_description: A tool for comparing sliding window dN/dS ratios against functional protein domain annotations. It aggregates bioinformatics information for VectorBase gene IDs to analyze selective pressures along protein sequences.

tools.name: deepSimDEF
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for functional analysis of genes via GO annotations
tools.detailed_description: Offers single- and multi-channel deep learning models for the functional analysis of genes using Gene Ontology (GO) annotations of gene products (RNAs, proteins).

tools.name: genofan
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for bacterial genome functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for the functional annotation of a set of bacterial genomes, facilitating comparative genomics and functional analysis.

tools.name: StrVCTVRE
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant classifier for exonic deletions and duplications
tools.detailed_description: StrVCTVRE is a classifier designed to predict the pathogenicity of structural variants, specifically exonic deletions and duplications, distinguishing between pathogenic and benign variants.

tools.name: distillR
tools.one_line_profile: Distilling functional annotations of genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: An R package for distilling and summarizing functional annotations of bacterial genomes and metagenomes, aiding in the interpretation of complex functional profiles.

tools.name: eXtasy
tools.one_line_profile: Variant prioritization by genomic data fusion
tools.detailed_description: A tool for variant prioritization that uses genomic data fusion to rank variants based on their likelihood of being causal or pathogenic.

tools.name: Variant Agents
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent system for genomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A multi-agent system designed for genomic analysis, likely facilitating distributed or modular processing of genomic data.

tools.name: mavis
tools.one_line_profile: Merging, Annotation, Validation, and Illustration of Structural variants
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool for the post-processing of structural variant calls. It handles merging, annotation, validation, and visualization (illustration) of structural variants from sequencing data.

tools.name: auto-acmg
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic classification of sequence variants and CNVs according to ACMG criteria
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic classification of sequence variants and Copy Number Variants (CNVs) based on the guidelines from the American College of Medical Genetics and Genomics (ACMG).

tools.name: DeepSVP
tools.one_line_profile: Prioritizing Copy Number Variants (CNV) using Phenotype and Gene Functional Similarity
tools.detailed_description: A method for prioritizing Copy Number Variants (CNVs) by integrating phenotype information and gene functional similarity measures.

tools.name: phenomenet-vp
tools.one_line_profile: Phenotype-based tool for variant prioritization in WES and WGS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to prioritize variants in Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) and Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) data by leveraging phenotype associations.

tools.name: Howard
tools.one_line_profile: Highly Open Workflow for Annotation & Ranking toward genomic variant Discovery
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for the annotation and ranking of genomic variants to facilitate variant discovery.

tools.name: IDP
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical isoform prediction method using hybrid sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A statistical isoform prediction method that constructs possible isoform candidates by combining long reads and short reads with spliced alignment.

tools.name: MyVariant.info
tools.one_line_profile: BioThings API for human variant annotations
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance API service for querying and retrieving aggregated human variant annotations from multiple sources.

tools.name: spliceAI-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of SpliceAI for splicing prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the SpliceAI model, used for predicting splice junctions and splicing effects of genomic variants.

tools.name: Varitas
tools.one_line_profile: Variant analysis with rapid incorporation of tabular annotation sources
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for variant analysis that facilitates the rapid incorporation and querying of tabular annotation sources.

tools.name: echtvar
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid variant annotation and filtering tool
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance tool for rapid annotation and filtering of genomic variants, designed to be efficient with large datasets.

tools.name: geneimpacts
tools.one_line_profile: Prioritize effects of variant annotations from VEP and SnpEff
tools.detailed_description: A library and tool to prioritize and normalize variant effect annotations from standard tools like VEP and SnpEff.

tools.name: slivar
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic variant expressions, annotation, and filtering
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering and annotating genetic variants in VCF format using simple expressions, designed for speed and flexibility.

tools.name: vcfanno
tools.one_line_profile: Annotate a VCF with other VCFs, BEDs, or tabixed files
tools.detailed_description: A fast and flexible tool for annotating VCF files with data from other VCFs, BED files, or tabixed files.

tools.name: SpliceAI-lookup
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for checking variant SpliceAI and Pangolin scores
tools.detailed_description: A tool and web interface for looking up precomputed SpliceAI and Pangolin scores for genomic variants to assess splicing impact.

tools.name: bystro-vcf
tools.one_line_profile: Extremely fast Variant Call Format annotation
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance VCF annotation tool designed for speed and scalability in genomic data processing.

tools.name: VAGrENT
tools.one_line_profile: Variation Annotation Generator for Reference Enriched Nucleotide Tracks
tools.detailed_description: A toolset for comparing genomic variants to reference genome annotation to identify potential biological consequences.

tools.name: vcf2maf
tools.one_line_profile: Convert VCF into TCGA MAF format
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert Variant Call Format (VCF) files into Mutation Annotation Format (MAF), commonly used in cancer genomics (TCGA).

tools.name: CHAP
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation of ion channel structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the functional annotation of ion channel structures, analyzing pore dimensions and hydrophobicity profiles.

tools.name: AutoCirc
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of back-splice junctions of potential circular RNAs
tools.detailed_description: A computational toolkit for fast and automatic identification of back-splice junctions of potential circular RNAs (circRNAs) from RNA-seq data.

tools.name: bcbio.prioritize
tools.one_line_profile: Prioritize small variants and structural variants based on biological inputs
tools.detailed_description: A tool to prioritize small variants, structural variants, and coverage regions based on known biological inputs and databases.

tools.name: Jannovar
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation of VCF variants with functional impact
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool and library for annotating VCF variants with functional impact and information from various databases.

tools.name: nf-ncov-voc
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating mutation profiles of SARS-CoV-2 or Mpox genomes
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow for analyzing and generating mutation profiles for SARS-CoV-2 or Mpox genomes, often used for variant of concern (VOC) tracking.

tools.name: EukMetaSanity
tools.one_line_profile: Structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: anor
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation and visualization system based on R and Shiny
tools.detailed_description: An R and Shiny-based system for annotation and visualization, likely designed for genomic or clinical data analysis.

tools.name: SUsPECT
tools.one_line_profile: Variant effect prediction based on custom long-read transcriptomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the effects of variants using custom transcriptomes derived from long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: CellFunTopic
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Annotation for Single-Cell Transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for functional annotation of single-cell transcriptomics data, enabling biological interpretation of cell clusters.

tools.name: paprbag
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogenicity prediction of bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the pathogenicity of bacterial genomes, useful for assessing the potential risk of bacterial variants or strains.

tools.name: LncADeep
tools.one_line_profile: Ab initio lncRNA identification and functional annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for the ab initio identification and functional annotation of long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs).

tools.name: SSNIP
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Splicing-derived Neoantigen Identifier Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for identifying neoantigens derived from cancer-specific splicing events (neojunctions), including neojunction calling and neopeptide prediction.

tools.name: euryale
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic reads, based on MEDUSA.

tools.name: GenOtoScope
tools.one_line_profile: Automated ACMG/AMP classification for congenital hearing loss variants
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated classification of human genetic variants associated with congenital hearing loss according to ACMG/AMP guidelines. It streamlines the interpretation process for specific disease-associated variants.

tools.name: vase
tools.one_line_profile: Variant Annotation, Segregation and Exclusion tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for variant annotation, segregation, and exclusion designed for family or cohort-based rare disease sequencing studies. It processes VCF files to filter variants based on inheritance models and allele frequencies.

tools.name: sansa
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant VCF annotation and comparison tool
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for annotating, deduplicating, and comparing structural variants (SVs) in VCF format. It is part of the Delly ecosystem and facilitates SV analysis.

tools.name: CharGer
tools.one_line_profile: Characterization of Germline variants tool
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for interpreting and characterizing germline variants, often used in the context of cancer genomics to classify pathogenicity based on clinical evidence and databases.

tools.name: dms-vep-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing deep mutational scanning of viral entry proteins
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline designed to analyze data from deep mutational scanning (DMS) experiments, specifically focusing on viral entry proteins to assess mutational effects.

tools.name: spliceai-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of SpliceAI for splicing effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the SpliceAI model, a deep neural network that predicts the effects of genetic variants on pre-mRNA splicing.

tools.name: UNIFAN
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised cell functional annotation for single-cell RNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for unsupervised functional annotation of cells in single-cell RNA sequencing data, aiding in the biological interpretation of cell clusters.

tools.name: eggnog-mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Fast genome-wide functional annotation through orthology assignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast functional annotation of novel sequences. It uses precomputed orthologous groups and phylogenies from the eggNOG database to transfer functional information with high precision.

tools.name: Exomiser
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to annotate and prioritize exome variants
tools.detailed_description: A Java program that functionally annotates and prioritizes variants from whole-exome sequencing data, utilizing phenotype comparisons and model organism data to identify disease-causing variants.

tools.name: GO FEAT
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid web-based functional annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform and tool for the rapid functional annotation of genomic and transcriptomic data, leveraging Gene Ontology (GO) terms.

tools.name: vcf-reformatter
tools.one_line_profile: VCF file parser and reformatter with VEP annotation support
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance tool written in Rust to parse and reformat VCF files, specifically designed to handle complex VEP (Variant Effect Predictor) annotations and convert them into analyzable formats.

tools.name: VarGenius
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for variant discovery and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software pipeline for variant calling and annotation. It manages data, submits jobs to clusters, and populates a PostgreSQL database with variant data for downstream analysis.

tools.name: SURVIVOR_ant
tools.one_line_profile: Framework to annotate structural variants
tools.detailed_description: A module within the SURVIVOR framework designed to annotate structural variants (SVs) using known SV databases (VCF) or genomic features (GFF/BED).

tools.name: MMSplice / MTSplice
tools.one_line_profile: Tissue-specific variant effect predictions on splicing
tools.detailed_description: A set of machine learning models (MMSplice and MTSplice) for predicting the effects of genetic variants on splicing, including tissue-specific splicing alterations.

tools.name: GeneMark-EP-plus
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic eukaryotic gene prediction supported by proteins
tools.detailed_description: A gene prediction tool for eukaryotic genomes that utilizes spliced aligned protein data to improve the accuracy of gene structure annotation.

tools.name: GeneSCF
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Set Clustering based on Functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for clustering gene sets based on functional annotations (e.g., GO, KEGG), facilitating functional enrichment analysis.

tools.name: genome-nexus-annotation-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for annotating VCF and MAF files for AACR GENIE
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools developed for the AACR GENIE project to annotate VCF and MAF files from various sequencing centers and merge the results, ensuring consistent variant annotation.

tools.name: ALOFT
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation Of Loss-of-Function Transcripts
tools.detailed_description: A tool that provides extensive functional annotations and pathogenicity predictions specifically for predicted loss-of-function (LoF) variants in the human genome.

tools.name: FA-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation pipeline in Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the functional annotation of proteins, specifically designed for non-model organisms, integrating various annotation databases and tools.

tools.name: HiGlass App
tools.one_line_profile: Application for viewing and exploring genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application wrapper around the HiGlass library, enabling users to visualize, explore, and annotate 1D and 2D genomic data (e.g., Hi-C matrices, tracks).

tools.name: VCF.Filter
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical tool to filter VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A Java application providing a graphical interface to filter and prioritize genomic sequence variants in VCF files based on custom annotations.

tools.name: MoDAFold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure-based missense mutant prediction strategy using AlphaFold2 and MD
tools.detailed_description: A strategy for predicting the structures of missense mutant proteins by combining AlphaFold2 for initial structure generation and Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulations for refinement, aiding in variant effect interpretation.

tools.name: aiDIVA
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogenicity prediction and prioritization of genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the pathogenicity of genetic variants and prioritizing them for clinical diagnostics, likely utilizing machine learning approaches.

tools.name: goldmine
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic context annotation and functional element enrichment discovery
tools.detailed_description: An R package for annotating genomic regions with context information and performing enrichment analysis to discover functional elements associated with the regions of interest.

tools.name: needLR
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant filtering and prioritization for long-read data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to filter and prioritize structural variants (SVs) detected in long-read sequencing data, helping to reduce false positives and identify relevant variants.

tools.name: variant_annotation_wf
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for annotating SNVs, indels, and structural variants
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive workflow for annotating various types of genetic variants including Single Nucleotide Variants (SNVs), insertions/deletions (indels), and Structural Variants (SVs).

tools.name: JCVI_HMP_metagenomic_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic functional annotation pipeline for HMP
tools.detailed_description: The metagenomic functional annotation pipeline used by the J. Craig Venter Institute (JCVI) for the Human Microbiome Project (HMP), facilitating the processing and annotation of metagenomic datasets.

tools.name: LaBranchoR
tools.one_line_profile: RNA splicing branchpoint prediction using LSTM
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using LSTM networks to predict RNA splicing branchpoints based on upstream sequence features, aiding in the understanding of splicing mechanisms and variant effects.

tools.name: genomics.ai
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for single-cell data annotation and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform leveraging neural networks to annotate and visualize single-cell sequencing data, providing an interactive interface for data exploration.

tools.name: pyVEP
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP)
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper/interface for the Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP), allowing users to interact with VEP programmatically within Python scripts and workflows.

tools.name: gw
tools.one_line_profile: Fast genome browser and variant annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance genome browser and variant annotation tool designed for visualizing sequencing data (BAM/CRAM/VCF) and inspecting variants with speed and efficiency.

tools.name: functional-annotation
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for functional annotation integrating multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to functionally annotate genomes by integrating data from various assays such as RNA-seq, ChIP-seq, and DNase-seq.

tools.name: TiSAn
tools.one_line_profile: Tissue-specific variant annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: An R package for tissue-specific annotation of genetic variants, helping to interpret the functional impact of variants in specific biological contexts.

tools.name: kipoi-veff
tools.one_line_profile: Variant effect prediction plugin for Kipoi model zoo
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Kipoi model zoo that enables variant effect prediction using various deep learning models hosted on Kipoi.

tools.name: SGSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Splice event prediction and quantification from RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A software package for analyzing splice events from RNA-seq data, allowing for the prediction and quantification of alternative splicing isoforms.

tools.name: gcv
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Context Viewer for comparative genomics and synteny
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization tool for comparative genomics, focusing on synteny and functional annotations to federate and explore genomic data across species.

tools.name: SVScore
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant prioritization using CADD scores
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool that aggregates CADD scores to prioritize structural variants (SVs), providing a pathogenicity scoring metric for larger genomic events.

tools.name: AlphaRING
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure-based missense variant deleteriousness prediction
tools.detailed_description: A package for predicting the deleteriousness of missense variants using protein structure information, designed to be interpretable.

tools.name: BedAnno
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic variation annotation using BED format databases
tools.detailed_description: A tool to annotate genomic variations (hg19) using custom or standard databases provided in BED format, facilitating flexible annotation workflows.

tools.name: PenLight
tools.one_line_profile: Protein representation learning for structural and functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using graph neural networks and contrastive learning to generate protein representations for downstream structural and functional annotation tasks.

tools.name: renovo
tools.one_line_profile: Machine-learning based interpreter of germline mutations
tools.detailed_description: A clinical machine-learning tool for interpreting the pathogenicity of germline mutations, designed to assist in medical genetics contexts.

tools.name: variant_calling_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling and annotation pipeline using BWA and GATK
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based pipeline automating variant calling and annotation steps, integrating standard tools like BWA, GATK, and ENSEMBL for reproducible analysis.

tools.name: pipette
tools.one_line_profile: Variant discovery and annotation pipeline wrapper
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby-based wrapper/pipeline for variant discovery and annotation, utilizing GATK and Ensembl resources to streamline genomic analysis.

tools.name: epilogos
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and summarization of multi-biosample functional annotations
tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for summarizing and visualizing functional genomic annotations across multiple biosamples, aiding in epigenomic data interpretation.

tools.name: hgvd2annovar
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for HGVD data to ANNOVAR database format
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to convert Human Genetic Variation Database (HGVD) table files into the generic database format required by ANNOVAR for variant annotation.

tools.name: update_annovar_db
tools.one_line_profile: Automation scripts for updating ANNOVAR databases
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts designed to automate the process of downloading and updating the annotation databases used by ANNOVAR.

tools.name: NGS_DNA
tools.one_line_profile: Best practice pipeline for Illumina NGS DNA analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for analyzing Illumina NGS DNA data, covering alignment, variant calling, annotation, and quality control, following best practices.

tools.name: Squirls
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable prioritization of splice variants in diagnostic NGS
tools.detailed_description: Squirls is a tool for the interpretable prioritization of splice variants in diagnostic next-generation sequencing data. It assesses the potential impact of variants on splicing and prioritizes them for clinical diagnosis.

tools.name: SvAnna
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogenicity prediction for structural variants in long-read sequencing
tools.detailed_description: SvAnna (Structural Variant Annotation and Analysis) provides efficient and accurate pathogenicity prediction for coding and regulatory structural variants detected in long-read genome sequencing data.

tools.name: vcf2maf
tools.one_line_profile: Convert VCF to MAF with isoform-specific annotation
tools.detailed_description: vcf2maf is a widely used utility that converts Variant Call Format (VCF) files into Mutation Annotation Format (MAF). It selects the most deleterious effect for each variant across all possible gene isoforms, simplifying downstream analysis.

tools.name: AlphaMissenseR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for accessing AlphaMissense pathogenicity predictions
tools.detailed_description: AlphaMissenseR provides an R interface to access and utilize AlphaMissense data resources, enabling researchers to incorporate AlphaMissense pathogenicity predictions into their R-based bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: VarNote
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and scalable variant annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: VarNote is a high-performance variant annotation tool designed for speed and scalability. It supports rapid annotation of massive variant datasets, making it suitable for large-scale genomic studies.

tools.name: FlickersOnTop
tools.one_line_profile: SSVEP and c-VEP flicker superposition tool for BCI research
tools.detailed_description: FlickersOnTop is a C# program designed to superpose SSVEP (Steady-State Visually Evoked Potential) and c-VEP flickers on top of other graphical interfaces, facilitating Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) experiments and data generation.

tools.name: smallvariants
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for calling and annotating small germline variants
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Nextflow for calling and annotating small germline variants (SNVs and indels) from short DNA reads, supporting WES and WGS data analysis.

tools.name: structural
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for calling structural variants, CNVs, and repeat expansions
tools.detailed_description: A best-practice bioinformatics analysis pipeline for detecting structural variants (SVs), copy number variants (CNVs), and repeat region expansions (RREs) from short-read DNA sequencing data.

tools.name: sarek
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for germline and somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/sarek is a comprehensive analysis pipeline to detect germline or somatic variants from Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) or targeted sequencing data. It handles preprocessing, variant calling, and annotation.

tools.name: Annotatability
tools.one_line_profile: Method to identify patterns in single-cell genomics via annotation-trainability
tools.detailed_description: Annotatability is a computational method that identifies meaningful patterns in single-cell genomics data by analyzing the training dynamics of deep neural networks to estimate annotation congruence.

tools.name: oncokb-annotator
tools.one_line_profile: Annotates variants in MAF with OncoKB precision oncology data
tools.detailed_description: The oncokb-annotator is a tool that annotates genetic variants in MAF format with clinical and biological information from the OncoKB precision oncology knowledge base.

tools.name: ngs_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for Exome/Capture/RNASeq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline implementation for processing Exome, Capture, and RNA-Seq data, facilitating reproducible NGS data analysis.

tools.name: SIFT4G_Create_Genomic_DB
tools.one_line_profile: Create genomic databases for SIFT4G annotation
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create genomic databases containing SIFT predictions from an organism's genomic DNA and gene annotation files. These databases are used by SIFT4G_Annotator to annotate VCF files with functional predictions.

tools.name: 2vcf
tools.one_line_profile: Convert 23andMe/Ancestry raw data to VCF
tools.detailed_description: A utility to convert raw genotype calls from direct-to-consumer testing services like 23andMe or Ancestry.com into the standard VCF format, adding dbSNP annotations.

tools.name: pylabel
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computer vision labeling and annotation format conversion
tools.detailed_description: PyLabel is a Python library for managing computer vision labeling tasks. It facilitates the translation of bounding box annotations between different formats (e.g., COCO to YOLO), supporting scientific image analysis workflows.

tools.name: phagetb
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of bacteriophage-host interactions
tools.detailed_description: PhageTB is a tool for the multi-level prediction of interactions between bacteriophages and pathogenic bacterial hosts, aiding in the study of phage therapy and bacterial genomics.

tools.name: pynnotator
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Annotation Framework for Mendelian Disorders
tools.detailed_description: Pynnotator is a genome annotation framework designed to annotate VCF files (Exomes or Genomes) specifically for patients with Mendelian disorders, facilitating variant prioritization and diagnosis.

tools.name: MetaboAnnotation
tools.one_line_profile: High-level functionality for metabolomics data annotation
tools.detailed_description: MetaboAnnotation provides high-level functions to support and simplify the annotation of metabolomics data, integrating with the R/Bioconductor mass spectrometry ecosystem.

tools.name: iAnnotateSV
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to annotate and visualize structural variants
tools.detailed_description: iAnnotateSV is a Python library and command-line toolkit designed to annotate and visualize structural variants detected from Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, aiding in the interpretation of complex genomic rearrangements.

tools.name: HmtNote
tools.one_line_profile: Human mitochondrial variants annotation using HmtVar
tools.detailed_description: HmtNote is a tool for the annotation of human mitochondrial variants using data from HmtVar. It provides a simple interface to retrieve variability and pathogenicity data for mitochondrial DNA variants.

tools.name: mode-of-inheritance
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning tool for predicting the mode of inheritance for missense variants
tools.detailed_description: A Random Forest based classifier that predicts whether a missense variant is likely to be dominant or recessive, aiding in the interpretation of variants in human genetics.

tools.name: vcf-annotator
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Python tool to add biological annotations to VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A script that adds annotations (such as gene information, product, etc.) to variants in a VCF file, facilitating downstream analysis.

tools.name: clinvar_db_for_annovar
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to automate ClinVar database updates for ANNOVAR
tools.detailed_description: A shell script designed to automatically download, format, and update the ClinVar database for use with the ANNOVAR annotation tool.

tools.name: SnpEffWrapper
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper to apply GFF annotations to VCFs using SnpEff
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper developed by Sanger Pathogens to facilitate the annotation of VCF files using SnpEff with custom GFF files.

tools.name: vcf-filtering
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for filtering annotated VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A collection of shell scripts designed to filter variant call format (VCF) files based on annotations, useful for post-annotation quality control.

tools.name: PCfun
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning tool for functional annotation of protein complexes
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses hybrid unsupervised and supervised machine learning on PubMed Central full-text word embeddings to functionally annotate protein complexes.

tools.name: region_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for annotating genomic intervals
tools.detailed_description: A Python script used to annotate genomic intervals, likely for identifying genomic features overlapping with regions of interest.

tools.name: ggcoverage
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualizing and annotating genomic coverage
tools.detailed_description: A ggplot2-based R package to visualize genomic coverage data (from BAM/BigWig) and annotate it with gene structures or other features.

tools.name: gvanno
tools.one_line_profile: Generic human DNA variant annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for annotating human DNA variants, integrating multiple tools and databases to provide functional context.

tools.name: spliceai-reforged
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized GPU implementation of SpliceAI
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-friendly reimplementation of SpliceAI, a deep learning tool for predicting splicing variants and their effects.

tools.name: veppy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Variant Effect Predictor (VEP)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interface to the Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP), facilitating its integration into Python-based workflows.

tools.name: CPT
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-protein transfer learning for variant effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning framework utilizing cross-protein transfer learning to improve the prediction of variant effects, particularly for proteins with limited data.

tools.name: annotate-peaks
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for genomic region annotation of BED files
tools.detailed_description: A set of R scripts designed to annotate genomic regions (provided in BED format) with gene information and other genomic features.

tools.name: reportIT
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical variant reporting pipeline for IonTorrent data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing and reporting variants from IonTorrent cancer panels, focused on clinical interpretation.

tools.name: annotateMaf
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to add functional annotations to MAF files
tools.detailed_description: An R-based tool designed to append functional variant annotations to Mutation Annotation Format (MAF) files, commonly used in cancer genomics.

tools.name: adam-fx
tools.one_line_profile: ADAM extension for loading SnpEff/SnpSift annotated VCFs
tools.detailed_description: A library extending the ADAM genomics framework to support loading and processing of VCF files that have been annotated with SnpEff and SnpSift.

tools.name: mvPPT
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogenicity Prediction Tool for missense variants
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool for predicting the pathogenicity of missense variants, likely utilizing multiple features or ensemble methods.

tools.name: snpeffToMaf
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from SnpEff annotated VCF to MAF format
tools.detailed_description: A Perl script that parses SnpEff annotations in a VCF file and converts them into the Mutation Annotation Format (MAF).

tools.name: VAPr
tools.one_line_profile: NoSQL variant data storage, annotation, and prioritization platform
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that facilitates the storage of variant data in NoSQL databases (MongoDB) and provides tools for annotation and prioritization.

tools.name: annonars
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance genome annotation tool using Rust and RocksDB
tools.detailed_description: A fast genome annotation tool built with Rust and RocksDB, designed to handle large-scale genomic data efficiently.

tools.name: mehari
tools.one_line_profile: VEP-like tool for Sequence Ontology and HGVS annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based tool that provides variant effect prediction capabilities similar to VEP, focusing on Sequence Ontology and HGVS nomenclature annotation.

tools.name: varianttools
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for manipulation, annotation, and analysis of variants
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for the manipulation, annotation, selection, and analysis of genetic variants derived from next-generation sequencing data.

tools.name: Postre
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of Structural Variant Effects
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to predict the effects of structural variants, addressing a gap in variant effect prediction which often focuses on small variants.

tools.name: MACARON
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-base Codon-Associated variant Re-annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for re-annotating variants that affect multiple bases within a codon, improving the accuracy of variant effect prediction for complex changes.

tools.name: superSFS
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for ancestral allele speculation and SFS calculation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for speculating ancestral alleles, calculating the Site Frequency Spectrum (SFS), and visualizing the results, used in population genetics.

tools.name: AnnoPred
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic risk prediction integrating LD and functional annotations
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian framework for genetic risk prediction that integrates linkage disequilibrium (LD) information and functional annotations to improve accuracy.

tools.name: anno
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient C++ variant annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool written in C++ for annotating genetic variants, designed for speed and efficiency in processing large datasets.

tools.name: seqminer
tools.one_line_profile: R package to query sequence data (VCF/BCF/BGEN)
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides efficient access to query and retrieve data from various sequence file formats like VCF, BCF, and BGEN.

tools.name: POCKET
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for prioritizing candidate genes using knowledge and GWAS/TWAS
tools.detailed_description: A tool for prioritizing candidate genes by incorporating knowledge-based gene sets, variant effects, and results from GWAS and TWAS studies.
